statements: SELECT student_name, score, grade FROM assessment_results;
SELECT id, assessment_date, grade FROM assessment_results WHERE score > 80;
SELECT id, student_name, assessment_date FROM assessment_results ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_name, assessment_date, score FROM assessment_results WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_name, grade FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_date = '2022-10-15' AND score < 70
SELECT id, student_name, assessment_date, grade FROM assessment_results WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND score >= 80
SELECT student_name, score FROM assessment_results WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_results WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM assessment_results GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT result_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_score >= 80 ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT u.name, ar.assessment_date, ar.assessment_score FROM users u JOIN assessment_results ar ON u.user_id = ar.user_id WHERE u.phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY ar.assessment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM user_assessments;
SELECT assessment_date, user_id, assessment_score FROM user_assessments;
SELECT * FROM user_assessments WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT assessment_score, assessment_date FROM user_assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_assessments;
SELECT * FROM user_assessments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(assessment_score) FROM user_assessments GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, progress_description FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80 AND assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT group_id, AVG(average_score) AS avg_score, AVG(average_progress) AS avg_progress FROM group_results
SELECT * FROM assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_score FROM assessments WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM groups WHERE group_leader_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT participant_name, assessment_score FROM participants JOIN assessments ON participants.participant_id = assessments.participant_id WHERE assessment_score > 80
SELECT group_name, average_score FROM groups JOIN group_assessment_results ON groups.group_id = group_assessment_results.group_id WHERE average_score < 50
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_score BETWEEN 60 AND 70
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY participant_name
SELECT * FROM assessment_results;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth = '1990-01-01';
SELECT group_name FROM groups WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT users.username, assessment_results.assessment_score FROM users JOIN assessment_results ON users.user_id = assessment_results.user_id;
SELECT * FROM assessment_results;
SELECT user_id, assessment_score FROM assessment_results ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';

SELECT u.username, a.assessment_score, g.group_name FROM users u JOIN user_assessments ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN assessment_results a ON ua.assessment_id = a.assessment_id JOIN user_groups ug ON u.user_id = ug.user_id JOIN groups g ON ug.group_id = g.group_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
